Job Brief: This role presents an excellent opportunity for ambitious fresh graduates to deepen their problem-solving abilities by tackling some of the most complex challenges in the e-Commerce industry and flex their analytical skills in a dynamic, data-driven working setting.
Job Description: The ProgrammeThe Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud.About the Team: We're in search of dynamic and highly motivated 2023/ 2024 graduates to join our Shopee SPX Team as Operational Excellence Analyst.   As an Operational Excellence Analyst, you'll play a pivotal role in optimizing and streamlining our logistics processes to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.   This role presents an excellent opportunity for ambitious fresh graduates to deepen their problem-solving abilities by tackling some of the most complex challenges in the e-Commerce industry and flex their analytical skills in a dynamic, data-driven working setting.   We offer a collaborative and friendly environment with opportunities for ownership and professional growth. What You Will DoProcess Optimization and Continuous Improvement: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze and optimize logistics processes for increased efficiency and effectiveness. Implement best practices and identify opportunities for continuous improvement in operational workflows. Ground Operations Improvement: Take a hands-on approach, willing to get your hands dirty, to identify, propose, and implement improvements in ground operations for a more streamlined and effective workflow. Data Analysis: Utilize Python and SQL to extract, transform, and analyze data, providing insights to drive informed decision-making. Project management: Design initiatives, track timelines, and assess impacts. Resolve issues effectively to ensure the successful execution of projects.Required Skills and AbilitiesEducation: Bachelor’s degree, expected graduation in 2024 or recent graduates, preferably in Business, Operations Management, Industrial Engineering, or a related field. Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with proficiency in Python and SQL for data analysis and reporting. Curiosity and Passion: Exhibit curiosity, passionate to understand the whys, and dedicated to solving problems and creating impact. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to convey complex ideas in a clear and concise manner. Hands-On Approach: Willing to get your hands dirty and work with ground ops, to implement improvements. Some travel will be required. Team Player: Collaborative mindset with the ability to work well in a team-oriented environment Detail-Oriented: Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high standards in operational processes. Adaptability: Ability to thrive in an agile and dynamic work environment.About Us:  Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan.   It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.   Shopee aims to continually enhance its platform and become the region’s e-commerce destination of choice via ongoing product optimization and localized user-centered strategies.

Job Description: The ProgrammeABOUT THE ASSOCIATE BUSINESS GRADUATE PROGRAMME (ABP).  Capco’s Associate Business Graduate Programme is the entry point into consulting with Capco and attracts individuals from a range of different backgrounds – from recent university graduates through to professionals with a desire to make a change in their career.  From day one as an Associate Business Consultant, you will start a two-week training program where you will be trained in courses such as Agile, Business Analysis, Design Thinking, and Project Management.   You will support in the development and delivery of market-changing and innovative solutions and strategies to our regional and global clients.   The Capco Associate Business Programme is designed to equip you with the skills and experience required to become our financial consulting leaders of tomorrow.   In addition, the programme will provide: Unique learning and development opportunities to build up your consulting, banking, and domain expertise. An experienced coach to support you by providing career advice and guidance throughout your career at Capco. A peer buddy from day one to help you settle in. Rotation across business areas to ensure that you gain insight across our various offerings. Fast career progression – we believe in rewarding success.Required Skills and AbilitiesWe are looking for individuals who are degree educated from any background or discipline who have an interest in financial services and are motivated to work in a fast-paced, challenging and project-based environment.   Previous professional experience is advantageous but not limited to those from within financial services.   We require strong verbal and written communication skills in both English and Cantonese (Mandarin is an advantage), matched with strong Microsoft Office knowledge.  Preferred Requirements: University degree – GPA 3.0 or a 2:1 equivalent and above. Proficiency in Microsoft Office – Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (Visio and Project an advantage). Fluency in English & Cantonese – written and spoken (Mandarin an advantage). Excellent communication skills. Self-starter, passionate about learning, and not afraid of a challenge.This is a Full-Time employment role for students graduating Summer 2024 or recent graduates.
